parameters.name: Body1
parameters.description: First body to check for interference

parameters.name: Body2
parameters.description: Second body to check for interference

parameters.name: CoincidentInterference
parameters.description: True to check for coincident interference, false to not

parameters.name: Body1InterferedFaceCount
parameters.description: Number of faces that are interfering that belong to the body passed in the first parameter of this method

parameters.name: Body2InterferedFaceCount
parameters.description: Number of faces that are interfering that belong to the body passed in the second parameter of this method

parameters.name: IntersectedBodyCount
parameters.description: Number of intersection bodies produced from this intersection
